comments: Decimal expansion of 11/45. - _Natan Arie' Consigli_ Jan 19 2016
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
formula: a(n) = 4 - 2*(binomial(2*n,n) mod 2), with n>=0. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 11 2009a(0) = 2, a(n) = 4 n>0. _Natan Arie' Consigli_ Jan 19 2016.
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 26000); x=contfrac(sqrt(5)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b040002.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 01 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
